bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Trying to select two entire rows in table view ends up selecting many more...
bug.description: On macOS High Sierra under Debug build. It works if I end at the second column but I can't select two entire rows (including row numbers) regardless of whether I start at the top left or the bottom right. Image attached. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/38528137-236b7036-3c13-11e8-9340-410046d5fe38.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Fixing these issues would require a rewrite of TC. Prioritizing the scroll behavior over the selection behavior. Removing Selection wouldn't allow individuals to copy and paste, prioritizing that functionality.
